name: Pixel Hunt (AYOUNG)
description:
Pixel Hunt is a 2D platformer made up of 5 levels that revolve around the central objective of finding the treasure chest at the end of the level. Each level is themed from an object that can be seen in level one and presents the player with unique obstacles and problems that must be solved over the course of searching for the chest.

Rocks, spikes, and chest acquired from: Free Pixel Space Platform Pack - AidenArt
All other art is made originally by Anna Young
